reviews.review:
The Portal games are great. I enjoyed the first game and this one but in different ways. The fist one had me focused on Chell and the GLaDOS (Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System). However, this game brought a lot more world building to it and introduced a new character to the story that was refreshing.
The game starts out in a similar way as the first but quickly shifts and just has some fun with it. I never felt board and beet it rather quickly. The eight hours includes the times I had to walk away from the game due to real world things that needed my attention. If you have some spare time to play a game, I recommend this one.
Wheatley gave me the chance to kill my self now, i didn't waste any second

Community Test Chambers = Unlimited unique gameplay.

The story is great! but what's better than a good story? Unlimited replayability!
Community Test chambers has kept this game fun for me long past completing the story.

I highly recommend to anyone considering the game.

Aqui acompanhamos a √∫ltima aventura de Chell em meio aos estranhos departamentos da misteriosa, sombria e sarc√°stica Aperture Science, adentrando cada vez mais fundo em seus dom√≠nios e explorando seu percurso desde uma remota e nebulosa origem. Sendo parte essencial dos segredos descobertos, a ic√¥nica GLaDOS tamb√©m est√° de volta, ganhando ainda mais desenvolvimento particular e tamb√©m explorando sua rela√ß√£o amb√≠gua com a protagonista. Ademais, surge tamb√©m um outro personagem, que, como a infame IA, √© √∫nico e incrivelmente carism√°tico √† sua maneira. 

Embora n√£o crave em pedra todos os pormenores desse universo, Portal 2 se forma com carinho √† mem√≥ria de "Portal", trazendo a l√≥gica dos "testes" junto a algo mais, sendo sua abordagem dos acontecimentos e detalhes bastante satisfat√≥ria e surpreendente, explorando habilidosamente a hist√≥ria que comp√¥s. Al√©m, com isso, ainda cria mais brechas para teorias e tamb√©m "links" aos seus "primos" da famosa s√©rie "Half Life". Como acr√©scimo de jogabilidade, o modo cooperativo aparece para, al√©m de complementar em roteiro, proporcionar momentos enigm√°ticos, desafiadores e divertidos entre amigos. Superando mas tamb√©m preservando seu legado, Portal permanece como uma boa proposta a ser percorrida.

Me and a friend had an easy and fun time with the game. We decided we want a challenge! So we downloaded some player made maps.....

Trying to complete player made maps in this game is a easy way to feel dumb. Read dumb. Its the only time a game managed to actually damage my self-esteem. 

And for that? 10/10, best game.
